ETYMOLOGY: From French, from Old French entreprendre 'to undertake', from entre- 'between' + prendre 'to take'.

MEANINGS.POS_TIP: Noun: A word (other than a pronoun) used to identify any of a class of people, places, or things (common noun), or to name a particular one of these (proper noun).
MEANINGS.DEF_EN: A person who organizes and operates a business or businesses, taking on greater than normal financial risks in order to do so.
MEANINGS.DEF_ZH: 创办并经营企业，承担较大财务风险以期获取利润的人。
MEANINGS.SENT_EN: The young entrepreneur launched his first successful startup right after college.
MEANINGS.SENT_ZH: 这位年轻的创业者大学毕业后立即创办了他的第一家成功的公司。
